title: 施密特对话德勤CEO：人工智能落地的第一步不是选择模型
description: 福布斯对话：谷歌前首席执行官施密特 × 德勤全球首席执行官谈人工智能革命。
titleZh: 施密特对话德勤CEO：人工智能落地的第一步不是选择模型
titleEn: Schmidt in Conversation with Deloitte CEO: The First Step in AI Implementation Is Not Choosing a Model
descriptionZh: 福布斯对话：谷歌前首席执行官施密特 × 德勤全球首席执行官谈人工智能革命。
descriptionEn: Forbes Conversation: Former Google CEO Schmidt × Deloitte Global CEO on the AI Revolution. When deploying AI, the first step for enterprises is almost always choosing a model. It seems that with the right model, AI can implement itself. But the reality is: no matter how powerful the model, if the organization doesn't adapt accordingly, AI will remain merely a display piece.
